AddUser(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, ComputeNodeUser, ComputeNodeAddUserOptions) AddUser(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, ComputeNodeUser, ComputeNodeAddUserOptions)

Edit

Adds a user account to the specified compute node.

public static ComputeNodeAddUserHeaders AddUser(this IComputeNodeOperations operations, string poolId, string nodeId, ComputeNodeUser user, ComputeNodeAddUserOptions computeNodeAddUserOptions = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function AddUser(operations As IComputeNodeOperations, poolId As String, nodeId As String, user As ComputeNodeUser, computeNodeAddUserOptions As ComputeNodeAddUserOptions = Nothing) As ComputeNodeAddUserHeaders
Parameters
operations
IComputeNodeOperations IComputeNodeOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

poolId
String String

The ID of the pool that contains the compute node.

nodeId
String String

The ID of the machine on which you want to create a user account.

user
ComputeNodeUser ComputeNodeUser

The user account to be created.

computeNodeAddUserOptions
ComputeNodeAddUserOptions ComputeNodeAddUserOptions

Additional parameters for the operation

Returns
ComputeNodeAddUserHeaders ComputeNodeAddUserHeaders

Remarks

You can add a user account to a node only when it is in the idle or running state.

public static ComputeNodeDisableSchedulingHeaders DisableScheduling(this IComputeNodeOperations operations, string poolId, string nodeId, DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption? nodeDisableSchedulingOption = null, ComputeNodeDisableSchedulingOptions computeNodeDisableSchedulingOptions = null)<ExtensionAttribute>

The operations group for this extension method.

poolId
String String

nodeId

nodeDisableSchedulingOption
Nullable<DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption> Nullable(Of DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption)

GetRemoteDesktop(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, ComputeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions) GetRemoteDesktop(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, ComputeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions)

Edit

Gets the Remote Desktop Protocol file for the specified compute node.

public static Stream GetRemoteDesktop(this IComputeNodeOperations operations, string poolId, string nodeId, ComputeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions computeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function GetRemoteDesktop(operations As IComputeNodeOperations, poolId As String, nodeId As String, computeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions As ComputeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions = Nothing) As Stream
Parameters
operations
IComputeNodeOperations IComputeNodeOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

poolId
String String

The ID of the pool that contains the compute node.

nodeId
String String

The ID of the compute node for which you want to get the Remote Desktop Protocol file.

computeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions
ComputeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions ComputeNodeGetRemoteDesktopOptions

Additional parameters for the operation

Returns
Stream Stream

Remarks

Before you can access a node by using the RDP file, you must create a user account on the node. This API can only be invoked on pools created with the cloud service configuration property.

GetRemoteLoginSettings(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions) GetRemoteLoginSettings(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions)

Edit

Gets the settings required for remote login to a compute node.

public static ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsResult GetRemoteLoginSettings(this IComputeNodeOperations operations, string poolId, string nodeId, ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions computeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function GetRemoteLoginSettings(operations As IComputeNodeOperations, poolId As String, nodeId As String, computeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions As ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions = Nothing) As ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsResult
Parameters
operations
IComputeNodeOperations IComputeNodeOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

poolId
String String

The ID of the pool that contains the compute node.

nodeId
String String

The ID of the compute node for which to obtain the remote login settings.

computeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions
ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsOptions

Additional parameters for the operation

Returns
ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsResult ComputeNodeGetRemoteLoginSettingsResult

Remarks

Before you can remotely login to a node using the remote login settings, you must create a user account on the node. This API can be invoked only on pools created with the virtual machine configuration property.

Reboot(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, Nullable<ComputeNodeRebootOption>, ComputeNodeRebootOptions) Reboot(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, Nullable(Of ComputeNodeRebootOption), ComputeNodeRebootOptions)

Edit

Restarts the specified compute node.

public static ComputeNodeRebootHeaders Reboot(this IComputeNodeOperations operations, string poolId, string nodeId, ComputeNodeRebootOption? nodeRebootOption = null, ComputeNodeRebootOptions computeNodeRebootOptions = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function Reboot(operations As IComputeNodeOperations, poolId As String, nodeId As String, nodeRebootOption As ComputeNodeRebootOption? = Nothing, computeNodeRebootOptions As ComputeNodeRebootOptions = Nothing) As ComputeNodeRebootHeaders
Parameters
operations
IComputeNodeOperations IComputeNodeOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

poolId
String String

The ID of the pool that contains the compute node.

nodeId
String String

The ID of the compute node that you want to restart.

nodeRebootOption
Nullable<ComputeNodeRebootOption> Nullable(Of ComputeNodeRebootOption)

When to reboot the compute node and what to do with currently running tasks. The default value is requeue. Possible values include: 'requeue', 'terminate', 'taskCompletion', 'retainedData'

computeNodeRebootOptions
ComputeNodeRebootOptions ComputeNodeRebootOptions

Additional parameters for the operation

Returns
ComputeNodeRebootHeaders ComputeNodeRebootHeaders

Remarks

You can restart a node only if it is in an idle or running state.

Nullable<ComputeNodeReimageOption> Nullable(Of ComputeNodeReimageOption)

When to reimage the compute node and what to do with currently running tasks. The default value is requeue. Possible values include: 'requeue', 'terminate', 'taskCompletion', 'retainedData'

computeNodeReimageOptions
ComputeNodeReimageOptions ComputeNodeReimageOptions

Additional parameters for the operation

Returns
ComputeNodeReimageHeaders ComputeNodeReimageHeaders

Remarks

You can reinstall the operating system on a node only if it is in an idle or running state. This API can be invoked only on pools created with the cloud service configuration property.

Remarks

You can reinstall the operating system on a node only if it is in an idle or running state. This API can be invoked only on pools created with the cloud service configuration property.

UpdateUser(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, String, NodeUpdateUserParameter, ComputeNodeUpdateUserOptions) UpdateUser(IComputeNodeOperations, String, String, String, NodeUpdateUserParameter, ComputeNodeUpdateUserOptions)

Edit

Updates the password or expiration time of a user account on the specified compute node.

Returns
ComputeNodeUpdateUserHeaders ComputeNodeUpdateUserHeaders

Remarks

This operation replaces of all the updateable properties of the account. For example, if the expiryTime element is not specified, the current value is replaced with the default value, not left unmodified. You can update a user account on a node only when it is in the idle or running state.
